name: Trixie OS
description:
YO yO Yo! IT'S THE DEV TEAM!1! 

Aren't ya fed up with big corporations like window and goggle, and their poor decision making? Well we have an ALL NEW OS! well uh... I guess you still need windows to run it BUT STILL!!1 anyway it's all free to download, we're still making stuff, but you can go https://discord.gg/eSMUBJuzJz and we'll ping you when the next update is out of the toaster oven. Also we put a promo code in there, no idea where it went though. like i went to check on it before releasing this but it wasn't there. anyhoo maybe you can find it somewhere? We'll make a way to redeem it in the next update if you do. also fair warning if your eyes strain easy don't accept any love letters.
